item.title: ORA-56841: Master Diskmon cannot connect to a CELL
item.description: Faced this error while querying v$asm_disk after adding new storage cell IPs to cellip.ora on DB nodes of an existing cluster on Exadata. Query ends withÂ ORA-03113 end-of-file on communication channel and ORA-56841 is reported in $ORA_CRS_HOME/log//diskmon/diskmon.log. Reason in my case was that the new cell was using different subnet for IB. It was pingable from the db nodes but querying v$asm_disk wasn’t working. Changing the subnet for IB on new cell to the one on existing cells fixed the issue.
